title: Next Generation Font Design For Screen Performance
content:
Modul Font Family was created for graduate thesis. This thesis presents font designs which are capable of covering what is demanded by the "digital age" and discusses the issues that need to be considered regarding the applications within this new age.  
It is available at [Antreposhop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114514/http:/www.antreposhop.com/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/591191226290085_4959.jpg)
author: antrepo
